item.title: Vythiri resort Wayanad
item.author: Rahul
item.description: where the rustling leaves ðŸƒ and flowing waters ðŸŒŠ become your lullaby Vythiri is scenic town in God’s own country in the district of Wayanad. A staycation at Vythiri resort was in bucket list since our marriage. We started from Bengaluru via the scenic Gundalpet, Bandipur route and reached the town of Vythiri just when the sun started its ascent amidst the mist. The entire place seemed super fresh and green from a recent water wash.
